name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: A research facility on Punk Hazard where Caesar Clown conducts his experiments. Contains prison cells and various scientific equipment. The mysterious 'Master' operates from this location.

keyEvents.title: Introduction to the Laboratory and Caesar Clown
keyEvents.description: The captured Straw Hats are shown to the mysterious 'Master' (Caesar Clown) who operates from this laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: First glimpse of Caesar's base of operations where he conducts unethical experiments.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational under Caesar Clown's control

name.english: Punk Hazard Laboratory Prison Cell CHECK-102
name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所牢獄CHECK-102

description: A prison cell inside Caesar Clown's laboratory marked as CHECK-102, where captured individuals are held. The Straw Hats (Nami, Sanji, Chopper, Franky) awaken here and meet Kin'emon's disembodied head.

keyEvents.title: Captured Straw Hats Awaken in Prison
keyEvents.description: Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky wake up imprisoned in cell CHECK-102 after being captured by hazmat-suited individuals.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the danger of Caesar's forces and creates a rescue subplot.

keyEvents.title: Meeting Kin'emon's Head in the Cell
keyEvents.description: The imprisoned Straw Hats discover Kin'emon's talking head in their cell and attempt to reassemble his body parts.
keyEvents.significance: Location where the Straw Hats first interact with Kin'emon and learn about his predicament.

statusHistory.reason: Cell is being used to hold prisoners

description: A large lake that divides Punk Hazard into two distinct halves - the burning lands and the frozen lands. This geographical feature is a result of the battle between Aokiji and Akainu for the position of Fleet Admiral.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of the Dividing Lake
keyEvents.description: Luffy's group approaches the lake that separates the burning and frozen halves of Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the unique geographical split of the island and foreshadows its important backstory.

name.japanese: パンクハザード燃える地

description: The fiery half of Punk Hazard, characterized by flames, lava, and extreme heat. This area was created by Akainu's magma powers during his battle with Aokiji. Contains burned buildings and is inhabited by various creatures.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Samurai's Legs
keyEvents.description: Luffy's group discovers the living legs of a samurai in the dragon's corpse in the burning lands.
keyEvents.significance: Key discovery location for Kin'emon's body parts.

keyEvents.title: Monet Spotted
keyEvents.description: Usopp spots Monet perched on a burned building in the burning lands before she disappears.
keyEvents.significance: First sighting of Monet on Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Permanent environmental condition from Akainu vs Aokiji battle
